Articles.Content:
59 minutes ago, max_creative said:

That will work. That's what I use. Torch only works for FallingSand and FallingGravel entities. 

I was going to build an AFK fish farm today...  

How does it lag for you? I almost always have <10 entities and >150 FPS! 

No. I will have an Andesite, Diorite, and Granite shop though. 

I NEED MENDING BOOKS!

You get a free one and I'll get a free one before they're gone!!!

Guys, it looks like I found a big cave system under the slime farm I was digging... I probably explored 2/3 of it already, though there are still some resources waiting to be mined. You can take all the ores from it as long as you help lighting it up so other mobs won't hinder the slimes from spawning.

Here are the coordinates:

x: -444 z: 245

These lead to a small hut with a ladder leading to the slime chunk. I think there should be a hole in the ground leading into the cave system.

Edited November 10, 2016 by ZentroCatson
who is Unknown_venom?

23 minutes ago, Kepler68 said:

You get a free one and I'll get a free one before they're gone!!!

The problem is that I'll be on in 6 hours...  I guess I'm making an AFK fish farm and going AFK for 8 minutes at a time while I read comics and stuff... 

11 minutes ago, ZentroCatson said:

Guys, it looks like I found a big cave system under the slime farm I was digging... I probably explored 2/3 of it already, though there are still some resources waiting to be mined. You can take all the ores from it as long as you help lighting it up so other mobs won't hinder the slimes from spawning.

Here are the coordinates:

x: -444 z: 245

These lead to a small hut with a ladder leading to the slime chunk. I think there should be a hole in the ground leading into the cave system.

Got it! 

11 minutes ago, SparkyFox said:

who is Unknown_venom?

Not me. There is someone named @Unknown Venom. It's probably them.

Guys i've just reviewed the server bandwith usage of the server and i have unfortunate news: 

the server is a bandwith hog... and by this rate... i won't make it to the end of the month...

This is a generous estimate that the bandwith used is 100mb an hour for each player..

I can buy extra bandwith at a rate of 5€/25GB... but that can rack up my bills...

I can however put a donate button button that let's anybody donate any amount they want, so that i can use that to cover the bills.

Ofcourse if more players donate, the less they have to..

 

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=9392QTGZVKBRL

 

-MK

3 minutes ago, MK3424 said:

Guys i've just reviewed the server bandwith usage of the server and i have unfortunate news: 

the server is a bandwith hog... and by this rate... i won't make it to the end of the month...

This is a generous estimate that the bandwith used is 100mb an hour for each player..

I can buy extra bandwith at a rate of 5€/25GB... but that can rack up my bills...

I can however put a donate button button that let's anybody donate any amount they want, so that i can use that to cover the bills.

Ofcourse if more players donate, the less they have to..

 

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=9392QTGZVKBRL

 

-MK

does that mean we need to donate to keep playing?

6 minutes ago, SparkyFox said:

does that mean we need to donate to keep playing?

You're not required to donate but it certainly would help me with the internet bills when more and more people are playing on the server later on...

19 minutes ago, MK3424 said:

You're not required to donate but it certainly would help me with the internet bills when more and more people are playing on the server later on...

mmmmmmmmm its probably cheaper in the long run, but if stuff gets worse but how about realms? although its a massive rip off and xbox live is cheaper, wouldn't  paying  like 60€ (I think) every 6 months be a bit cheaper? they only host the server but you still get full control  and it would be easier on the electric bills aswell, but only if things get too much and as a last resort

51 minutes ago, MK3424 said:

Guys i've just reviewed the server bandwith usage of the server and i have unfortunate news: 

the server is a bandwith hog... and by this rate... i won't make it to the end of the month...

This is a generous estimate that the bandwith used is 100mb an hour for each player..

I can buy extra bandwith at a rate of 5€/25GB... but that can rack up my bills...

I can however put a donate button button that let's anybody donate any amount they want, so that i can use that to cover the bills.

Ofcourse if more players donate, the less they have to..

 

https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=9392QTGZVKBRL

 I would definitely donate to help the server if I could, but I can't.  

To help I guess I could try to use my time more efficiently while I'm playing?

Where can I get Unbreaking III and Efficiency V books? I'm starting the big digging project tomorrow. I have a good pickaxe (thanks Sparky!) but I need a good shovel. 

I also restocked my glass shop. I'm going to hook it up to my super smelter soon. I had no idea you guys would use it so much!

2 hours ago, max_creative said:

Where can I get Unbreaking III and Efficiency V books? I'm starting the big digging project tomorrow. I have a good pickaxe (thanks Sparky!) but I need a good shovel. 

I also restocked my glass shop. I'm going to hook it up to my super smelter soon. I had no idea you guys would use it so much! 

I have a diamond shovel with efficiency III or more that you can use as long as you repair it and give it to me after use. You can find it in the chest below the cake in my shed.

18 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:

I have a diamond shovel with efficiency III or more that you can use as long as you repair it and give it to me after use. You can find it in the chest below the cake in my shed.

I'm just going to use my efficiency II pickaxe. 

@MK3424? I want to help but I can't donate. Is there anything else I can do to help the server?

I know I'm double posting, but I have a question: does anyone want to trade with me? I really need a diamond but I don't have time for mining right now. I also need slimeballs. I probably will have to pay in redstone blocks or something though. I have a lot of redstone stuff.

9 hours ago, max_creative said:

@MK3424? I want to help but I can't donate. Is there anything else I can do to help the server?

There is'nt... and moving the server to another pc is not an option... you know how that turned out...

I need rails, switches, and powered rails.  Please deliver them with a chest to the junction bridge if you're giving.  About half way done.  At the end of the line we will need a cart storage and call system.  If you're going to build that, please make it all underground so the line can be extended if need be..  I put a marker past the terminal station to where it should be.  Also if you dont want to craft rails, iron ingots or ore are also accepted!

 

- Andy

11 hours ago, MK3424 said:

There is'nt... and moving the server to another pc is not an option... you know how that turned out...

So there isn't anything I can do to help you? Aw...  

2 hours ago, transitbiker said:

I need rails, switches, and powered rails.  Please deliver them with a chest to the junction bridge if you're giving.  About half way done.  At the end of the line we will need a cart storage and call system.  If you're going to build that, please make it all underground so the line can be extended if need be..  I put a marker past the terminal station to where it should be.  Also if you dont want to craft rails, iron ingots or ore are also accepted!

Ok! I know how to make a really compact minecart station. Can I build one for the east desert station?

I would be ok with that but it needs to meet a lot of requirements:

-unbuggable

-extremely user friendly and easy to use

-users can't get where not wanted (systems and rails mainly)

-probably some more but I can't remember right now

3 minutes ago, Fluburtur said:

I would be ok with that but it needs to meet a lot of requirements:

-unbuggable

-extremely user friendly and easy to use

-users can't get where not wanted (systems and rails mainly)

-probably some more but I can't remember right now

So... Use RS nor latches and an automatic cart system using dispensers and cactus? Sure. And I'll add sequential lighting and a 4x4 piston door just for fun. 

Wait, are you the guy who built the paradise city station?

3 hours ago, max_creative said:

So there isn't anything I can do to help you? Aw...  

Ok! I know how to make a really compact minecart station. Can I build one for the east desert station? 

Sure!  Just talk to fluburtur about it.  We were saying that we could have the passengers disembark there, but a separate cargo carrying system go farther into the desert for sand harvesting and ore gathering.

- Andy

Edited November 13, 2016 by transitbiker

1 hour ago, transitbiker said:

Just talk to fluburtur about it.  We were saying that we could have the passengers disembark there, but a separate cargo carrying system go farther into the desert for sand harvesting and ore gathering.

Sure. I'm going to make it sure awesome with sandstone and glass and everything! Where's should I build the station? 

@Fluburtur? I think something happened to paradise station. I tried to use it but it wasn't working. I took a look but I couldn't tell what happened. It was really dark and your redstone is a huge mess of wiring. 

@ZentroCatson I really like your piston house! It's a really cool looking modern house! I do have one question: why did you use a 1x2 door instead of a 3x3 door or something?

1 hour ago, max_creative said:

@Fluburtur? I think something happened to paradise station. I tried to use it but it wasn't working. I took a look but I couldn't tell what happened. It was really dark and your redstone is a huge mess of wiring. 

Also I was very careful to not break any redstone. I did have to break into the wall to try and take a look but I didn't break any redstone. 

Hey guys? I have a question. If I built a redstone bank for everyone would you use it? With keycard readers and vault doors and stuff.

On 11/7/2016 at 8:59 PM, max_creative said:

What's your username? And where's your house? 

Aorlando and 9 sanctuary lane or view I dont remember

5 hours ago, max_creative said:

 I really like your piston house! It's a really cool looking modern house! I do have one question: why did you use a 1x2 door instead of a 3x3 door or something? 

I'm glad you like it  I used a 1x2 door because it is simple and I won't have to use the top floor to hide the redstone. Though I might change it to a 2x2, but the kitchen is in the way... 

And of course the door isn't the only redstone thing in my house! I have already put in a working aquarium, a hidden crafting area in the living room, slime launchers for getting to the top floor and basement and even automatic lighting. And that still isn't everything! I'll put a hidden armory, a bulk storage system with indicator lights and maybe even a supersmelter in the basement.

Edited November 13, 2016 by ZentroCatson
@max_creative you can talk to me on the discord group any time, I can explain you how most of the system works.

14 hours ago, AlmostNASA said:

Aorlando and 9 sanctuary lane or view I dont remember

Thanks! 

10 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:

I'm glad you like it  I used a 1x2 door because it is simple and I won't have to use the top floor to hide the redstone. Though I might change it to a 2x2, but the kitchen is in the way... 

It's not that hard to put in a 2x2. Have the button activated by quasi-conductivity and have the wiring below the door instead of above it.

10 hours ago, ZentroCatson said:

And of course the door isn't the only redstone thing in my house! I have already put in a working aquarium, a hidden crafting area in the living room, slime launchers for getting to the top floor and basement and even automatic lighting. And that still isn't everything! I'll put a hidden armory, a bulk storage system with indicator lights and maybe even a supersmelter in the basement.

I know! I looked around a little. What about an automatic sorting system instead of a bulk storage? With the items that haven't been sorted going into a horizontal silo at the end. 

5 hours ago, Fluburtur said:

@max_creative you can talk to me on the discord group any time, I can explain you how most of the system works.

No Discord. I know how it works but I don't know what each of the wires are because they are all cobblestone and they're all over the place.
